|brand = Arris |model = SB6190 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = cable modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Puma;DHCE2672; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = X86-64<!-- Intel Atom --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- 1.6 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |cm_down_c = 32 |cm_up_c = 8 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = <!-- VDC,VAC, or POE, --> |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_vac = <!-- AC Volts --> |pwr_ac_hz = <!-- AC Hertz --> |pwr_amp_ac = <!-- AC Amps --> |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 3.0 |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== DOCSIS 3.0 32x8
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.dslreports.com/forum/r31134484- ''Arris SB6190 (Intel Puma 6 / MaxLinear)'' on ''' DSLReports''']
==See also== ===[[Intel Puma]] 6/6MG (Media Gateway) chipsets=== *'''[[Arris]]''': [[Arris SB6190]], [[Arris TM1602A]], [[Arris TM1602G]] :[[Arris TG1642]], [[Arris DG1642]], [[Arris DG1660A]], [[Arris DG1670A]] (/ACT) :[[Arris TG1662A]], [[Arris TG1662G]], [[Arris TG1662S]], [[Arris DG1662G]] :[[Arris TG1672A]], [[Arris TG1672G]], [[Arris TG1682G]], [[Arris MG2402G/CT]] :[[Arris DG2460A]], [[Arris DG2470A]], [[Arris TG2472G]], [[Arris TG2492]] ::''(Virgin Media Hub 3)''
*'''[[AVM]]''': [[AVM FRITZ!Box 6460]], [[AVM FRITZ!Box 6490]] *'''[[Cisco]]''': [[Cisco XG1-V3]], [[Cisco DPC3848]] (V), [[Cisco DPC3939]] :[[Cisco DPC3941B]] / DPC3941TÃ‚ ''(commonly - Comcast Xfinity XB3)'' *[[Compal CH7466]], [[Compal CH7465-LG]] ([[Arris TG2492LG]] / ::''Virgin Media Hub 3'')
*'''[[Hitron]]''': CDA Series: [[Hitron CDA-32372]], [[Hitron CDA-3-35]]; CDE Series: [[Hitron CDE-32372]] :CGN3 Series: [[Hitron CGN3]], [[Hitron CGN3ACR]], [[Hitron CGN3AMF]], [[Hitron CGN3AMR]], [[Hitron CGN3ACSMR]] :CGNM Series: [[Hitron CGNM-2250]], [[Hitron CGNM-3552]]; CGNV Series: [[Hitron CGNV4]]; CGNDM Series: -
*'''[[SMC]]''': [[SMC D3G2408]]; '''[[Samsung]]''': [[Samsung Home Media Server]] *'''[[Linksys]]''': [[Linksys CM3016]], [[Linksys CM3024]], [[Linksys CG7500]]
*'''[[Netgear]]''': [[Netgear CM700]], [[Netgear CG4500]] (TM) :[[Netgear C6300]] (BD - Telstra Gateway Max - Australia) Note: <small>CG4500 & C6300BD that ''Cox Communications'' utilizes are [[Broadcom]] BCM3383 based devices, not [[Intel Puma]] 6/6MG based devices. :There are differing versions of each product with either an [[Intel Puma]] or [[Broadcom]] processor installed.</small>
